OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD SPEECH AND LANGUAGE THERAPY SERVICE

Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Primary Care Trust. Provides therapy and support to adults and children with communication, speech, eating or swallowing difficulties, including those with special needs. Services are provided at a number of locations throughout the city and within the home. Self or any referral.

DisabledAccess.entry: Access via several steps with railings, Lifts - external and internal
